de.must.dataobj
Interface DataObjectConstructionDetails

All Known Implementing Classes:
AssoDataObject, DataObject, DataObjectForTermReplacement, DataObjectReadOnlyWithCache, DataObjectWithGroupOverview, DirectDataObject, DoAddressBuffer, DoCookbook, DoGrPj, DoGzPj, DoIdent, DoIdent, DoKontakt, DoKontaktart, DoKontaktJoined, DoParam, DoType, DoUser, DoUser, Global, Global, GlobalStd, SelfChainingDataObject, SessionData, SessionData
public interface DataObjectConstructionDetails

Details needed to construct a data object, e.g. the connection to use. Depending on the wished architecture, different objects may contain these informations. Objects which can provide this informations may implement this interface and pass the details to data objects in that manner.

See Also:
DataObject

Method Summary

          Returns the connection to use.

          Returns the IdManager to use.
